      • isPropertyMethod

        public static boolean isPropertyMethod(Method method)
        Returns true if the method is property method(getter, setter). This applies to both non-static and static methods.

      • isGetter

        public static boolean isGetter(Method method)
        Returns true if the method property getter method. This applies to both non-static and static methods.

        public static boolean isSetter(Method method)
        Returns true if the method property setter method. This applies to both non-static and static methods.
